Class XMLTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.XMLTools

  • public class XMLTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains static methods for helping with XML reading and writing.

    0.2
    Version:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti

      • parse

                                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                         java.io.IOException,
                                         javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        Parse given File to document.
        Parameters:
        file - File to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Document from file, or null, if something went wrong.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - In case of an error.
        java.io.IOException - In case of an error.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - In case of an error.
